name: Mine it All !
description:
Mine it All ! is a small One-Button game, I made as a challenge for myself.

The only button is any mouse click (or touch screen if you want), just hold for a second; first click, you will move forward, and once stopped, click again to throw the grabber and get some loots !

Use the shops to buy skills that will help you gain more money, get more lucky or unlock some cool abilities !

The game auto-save at the beginning of each levels.

Additional commands :

  • Suppr : Will delete your save and reset the game at the 1st level.
  • M : Will (un)mute the game.
  • Numpad + : Will increase the volume.
  • Numpad - : Will decrease the volume.

Crédits :
Sounds are from freesound.org
Visual assets are either buyed licensed or made by me.
The code and everything else is by me : Wiirlak
